normalised: energy and utilities: solar rooftop subsidies

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Thinking of going solar on your roof? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced extended subsidies for rooftop solar installations.
normalised: good news, folks! thinking of going solar on your roof? the ministry of new and renewable energy (M N R E) just announced extended subsidies for rooftop solar installations.

unnormalised: Yep, you heard it right! Get ready to harness the power of the sun and save some serious Rs. The "Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana" is still kicking, offering subsidies up to 40% for residential rooftops.
normalised: yep, you heard it right! get ready to harness the power of the sun and save some serious rupees. the "surya ghar: muft bijli yojana" is still kicking, offering subsidies up to forty percent for residential rooftops.

unnormalised: Imagine powering your whole house with clean energy, and even selling the excess back to the grid! Think of all the samosas you can buy with the savings!
normalised: imagine powering your whole house with clean energy, and even selling the excess back to the grid! think of all the samosas you can buy with the savings!

unnormalised: Sources say, installations up to 3kW get the maximum love. Larger systems also benefit, but the subsidy percentage tapers down a bit.
normalised: sources say, installations up to three kilowatt get the maximum love. larger systems also benefit, but the subsidy percentage tapers down a bit.

unnormalised: Don't delay, though! These schemes are popular, and like that perfectly cooked biryani at your cousin's wedding, they might not last forever.
normalised: don't delay, though! these schemes are popular, and like that perfectly cooked biryani at your cousin's wedding, they might not last forever.

unnormalised: Contact your local discom or visit the MNRE website to learn more and apply. Diwali is just around the corner; wouldnâ€™t it be nice to celebrate with a lower electricity bill thanks to your shiny new solar panels? Go green, save green!
normalised: contact your local discom or visit the M N R E website to learn more and apply. diwali is just around the corner; wouldn't it be nice to celebrate with a lower electricity bill thanks to your shiny new solar panels? go green, save green!
